name: Flappy Bird (itch) (ERmilburn02)
description:
Space to jump.

I shouldn't need to say this, but just in case: you need to extract the game to run it!

To run, either double click the executable, or run it from the command line. All required dependencies should be included. If you do encounter missing dependencies, please let me know.

Windows build is experimental! Let me know if something's broken!

If compiling from source, raylib is required.

Assets are from MegaCrash and are used under CC0.

Parts of the base engine used to build this game (window, textures)  were developed before the start of the Linux Game Jam 2022. All game logic was created during the Jam.
